_calculatePrizeMoney(bytes32,uint256).return: Prize money for a final standing position

params.finalStandingIndex: Index in the tournaments' entries final standings

claimTournamentPrize(bytes32,uint256,uin.return: Whether the tournament prize was claimed

params.entryIndex: Entries index in the tournament's entries array

claimTournamentRefund(bytes32,uint256).return: Whether entry fees were refunded for tournament entry

params.finalStandings: Final standings for entries in the tournament. 1d index => entry index, 2d => final standings for entry index
params.uniqueFinalStandings: Number of unique positions in the final standing array

params.table: Array of integers representing redeemable prize money for each position represented by indices in the array

createPrizeTable(uint256[]).return: Unique ID of the prize table

params.entryLimit: Entry limit for each unique address
params.maxEntries: The maximum number of entries for the tournament
params.minEntries: The minimum number of entries for the tournament
params.prizeTable: Unique ID of prize table to be used for the tournament
params.rakePercent: Percentage of the prize pool retained by Decent.bet

createTournament(uint256,uint256,uint256.return: Unique ID of the created tournament

params.prizeWinnerIndex: Index of prize winner in tournaments' prizes array

_calculatePrizeMoney(bytes32,uint256).notice: Calculates prize money for a provided final standing position in a given prize table id

claimTournamentPrize(bytes32,uint256,uin.notice: Allows users to claim their tournament prizes

claimTournamentRefund(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows users to claim refunds for tournaments that were not completed

completeTournament(bytes32,uint256[][],u.notice: Allows the admin to complete the tournament by publishing the final standings

createPrizeTable(uint256[]).notice: Creates a prize table that can be used for a tournament

createTournament(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Creates a tournament that users can enter

enterTournament(bytes32).notice: Allows users to enter a tournament by paying the listed entry fee

getRakeFee(bytes32).notice: Returns rake fee for a tournament

getTournamentEntry(bytes32,uint256).notice: Returns an entry address at a tournament entries index

getTournamentFinalStanding(bytes32,uint2.notice: Returns a final standing for a tournament

getTournamentPrizeWinnerAtIndex(bytes32,.notice: Returns a tournament prize winner at a provided final standing and prize winner index

getTournamentPrizeWinnersLength(bytes32,.notice: Returns the number of tournament prize winners for a provided final standing position
